title: What are some examples of paralanguage skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Definition of Paralanguage: Vocal features that accompany speech and contribute to communication but are not generally considered to be part of the language system, as vocal quality, loudness, and tempo: sometimes also including facial expressions and gestures. Some examples: Ability to explain complex technology and operations in layman terms to non-technical personnel.Ability to calm people through voice tone, tempo and facial expressions.The ability to excite a crowd by vocal quality, loudness, tempo, and gestures.
